entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.Http.Functional - NativeAOT timeouts #75493
  • Hot reloading a change in Blazor WebAssembly app after hitting a breakpoint causes browser to crash #75492
    7.0.0
  • Reflection-free Native AOT and Enum.IsDefined #75487
  • System.Net.Security crash on arm64-Mono #75484
  • HttpClient crashes app with no error #75483
  • TarWriter uses ASCII to write down fields and should use UTF8 instead #75482
    7.0.0
  • Annotate remaining runtime libraries for NativeAOT #75480
    8.0.0
  • Why is `System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Id` a `long`? #75476
  • [wasm-mt] AOT compilation with threading enabled results in out of bounds memory access #75474
    7.0.0
  • Quic tests timing out on Linux arm32 #75471
  • Explore ways to reduce Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler size #75468
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: WasmTestOnBrowser-System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles - Memory access out of bounds #75465
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.HashAlgorithmTest.ComputeHashAsync_SupportsCancellation - no exception #75463
  • [release/7.0][wasm] V8 segfault on perf pipeline #75459
  • Consolidate System.Private.Xml tests into a single csproj #75456
    8.0.0
  • SqlServer.Types regressed on .NET 7 #75455
  • JIT: Bad codegen with loop #75442
    8.0.0
  • Performance regression when deserializing compressed binary XML streams using data contract serializers #75437
  • HttpClientHandler always set LocalCertificateSelectionCallback delegate in SslOptions #75434
  • [API Proposal]: Random.Next<T> #75431
    8.0.0

Closed

  • CI failure: `Installer-coreclr-Linux_x64-Release` `Microsoft.NET.HostModel.ComHost.Tests`- Constructor parameters did not have matching fixture data: SharedTestState fixture #75491
  • Get,Post,Put methods...... #75446
  • Prefer32Bit flag produces invalid output assembly in .NET 7 #70776
    7.0.0
  • FileNotFoundException for Microsoft.SqlServer.Types 10.0.0.0 when trying to use SQL Server geography data #75481
    Future
  • Feature proposal: remove implicit construction of DateTimeOffset from DateTime #32954
    Future
  • System.Net.* and System.Security.* crash on NativeAOT arm64 #74710
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.DotNet.CoreSetup.Test.HostActivation tests failing in CI #75429
  • ConfigurationReloadToken does not suppress ExecutionContext capture #36507
    Future
  • JIT: Redundant fmov's on arm64 for a simple function #58954
    Future
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #66568
    7.0.0
  • [mono] iOS HelloWorld sample build configuration does not use same size optimizations as MAUI #75337
    8.0.0
  • Enhance Console.ReadLine() to return at Tab #800
    Future
  • [wasm] `System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests` failing with `memory access out of bounds` #75430
  • Error hot reloading new method in Blazor WebAssembly app #75324
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests crash on OSX Mono #75307
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Benchstones\\BenchI\\Fib\\Fib\\Fib.cmd #75325
  • [wasm-mt] Add a System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.BrowserSynchronizationContext #69409
    Future
  • Memory leaking with Serializing JSON on Large Objects #75314
  • [WASM] Anonymous pipes issue #75394
  • [Mono] Behavior difference between optimized and non-optimized build #75125
    8.0.0
  • Can we make HttpClientFactory as purely configuration API? #74508
  • System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException message is incorrect when inserting into a list #1250
    Future
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize does not serialize properties as interface data type #75402
  • [mono] Optimize box+callvirt to direct call #32166
    8.0.0
  • JIT: check/release diff in arm SPMI libraries_tests.pmi #75221
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluate expression on VS #75495
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluate expression on VS #75494
    area-Build-mono
  • Reverting change in source generators that require Roslyn 4.4 until we have a VS version with the compiler fix to consume them. #75490
  • JIT: fix SPMI collection for getStaticFieldCurrentClass #75489
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • load quic early to prevent interaction with tests #75488
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • [release/7.0] Port workload fixes from 6.0 #75486
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add well-known OIDs to System.Formats.Asn1 #75485
    tenet-performance, area-System.Formats.Asn1, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] udpate MsQuic to 2.1.1 #75479
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • Minor fixes to write barriers #75478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump emscripten dep to use new manifest #75477
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix exclusions. #75475
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use AzDO Pipeline Resources to define our build Docker containers #75473
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix reference to `Microsoft.Build.NoTargets` #75472
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Simplify and fix the Int128 *, /, and % logic #75470
    area-System.Numerics
  • [Mono]: Add PLT entry index validation mode for MONO_ARCH_CODE_EXEC_ONLY. #75464
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [main] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring #75462
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/7.0] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring #75461
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [WIP][mono][tests] Testing disabled library tests on ARMv6 architecture #75458
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [Android] Update DateTimeOffset.Now fast path routine #75457
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • [release/6.0] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring #75454
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Replace net7 with net8 in dogfooding and workflow docs #75453
    area-Meta
  • Remove most of string.Trim() usages in System.Private.Xml solution. #75452
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Do not maintain `GTF_VAR_MULTIREG` before lowering #75449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] enable issue 58812 #75444
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConvertToInt32 intrinsics for Amd64 #75443
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't unload MsQuic from the process #75441
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Revert "[mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interop… #75438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Implements eager finalization of weak references #75436
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • set session ID when TLS resume is enabled #75435
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • JIT: fix incorrect scale in genCreateAddrMode + no-opt #75433
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [release/7.0] load msquic early to avoid interference with RemoteExecutor #75466
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix macOS floating point corruption #75467
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0][mono] Fix assertion while adding a new method using Hot Reload #75460
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Manually backporting #74599 to 7.0 for RC2. #75366
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • [Perf] Update shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App path from 7.0.0 to 8.0.0 path for main runs. #75285
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • update helix queues to pick up MsQuic 2.1.1 #75380
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Replace marshalled delegate in X509Certificate verification #75401
    area-System.Security
  • Make RegisterChangeCallback consistent with CancellationChangeToken and ConfigurationReloadToken #75158
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Allow substituting SIMD calls into HWIs #75448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make forward sub a little bit more precise in GLOB_REF tagging #75404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • remove Centos 8 from Helix as it is EOL #75299
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • use Task.Run to execute SmtpClient #74910
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Arm64: Skip redundant hwintrinsic float movs (#58954) #75202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix broken `dotnet-runtime-perf` #75408
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Fix macOS floating point corruption #75440
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix test issues on armv6, ppc64le on runtime-community #75367
    area-Meta, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • Including ILStrip build task when building iOS sample app in fullAOT mode #75339
    area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [wasm] Add common vector min/max implementation #75451
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • load msquic early to avoid interference with RemoteExecutor #75424
    test-enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Target only net7.0 during source-build #75168
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update APICompat and compatibility suppression files #75447
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Add RIDs for macOS 13 #75428
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Do not emit mangled names in mstat files #75407
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Flush instruction cache after thunk pool allocation #75403
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows (#75176) #75377
    area-System.Transactions
  • [release/7.0][wasm][host] Track change in forwardConsole parameter to forwardConso… #75372
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Bump the NoTargets version #75397
  • [mono] Fix assertion while adding a new method using Hot Reload. #75432
    area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix WebSockets.Client.ConnectTest crash for apple mobile platforms #75423
    area-System.Net, test-bug, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Additional build fixes #75297
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Use newer helix images with updated v8 #75271
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Android][libs] Introduce DateTimeOffset.Now temporary fast result #74965
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Unit test running two instances of .NET #75181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Delete a few dead NetworkInformation helpers #74976
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] add git hash to dotnet.js and print it from unit tests #75279
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Quiet NaNs on x86 hosts #75338
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix IPv6 detection in QUIC tests #75382
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for macOS 13 #75371
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

Updated

  • Avoid unnecessary overflow check during div/mod on Arm64 (#46010) #75272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix running WebAssembly Browser App from VS #75384
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions and block ARM #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Supply official build id to inner-source build command #75293
  • AOT ILC using a LKG bits #74435
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix prefix writing on TarHeaderWrite #75373
    area-System.IO
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Bump the macOS image to one that isn't EOL yet #75294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change VerifyXmlResolver to use TcpListener over HttpListener #75369
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #74839
    community-contribution
  • [iOS] Test against iOS 16 beta #74809
    NO-MERGE
  • [wasm-mt] Disable and fix remaining failing tests on Browser with multi-threading and perf tracing enabled #75286
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Only widen short local stores #74685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete some unnecessary code #74527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: run local struct to field update in morph both pre and post order for returns #75304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test]Disable failing iossimulator tests #74889
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline errors #75406
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Add guard word before local var CMiniColDef[9] #73736
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix spilling of `MUL_LONG` on x86 and multi-reg HWIs #73079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Some SIMD-related cleanup #73819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Fix converting old SIMD ctors to HWI ones #71865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JitDisasm cosmetic improvements #75425
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #75311
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Fix json Serializer (all Proprties should be used) #73121
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 AndNot intrinsic for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Modify XmlSerializators to use typed XmlWriter.WriteValue method #75415
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via crossgen2 #75230
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Initialization failures logging #75097
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • R2R fixes for [Equality]Comparer.Default in jit #75422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No help for specific `dotnet nuget` commands #27833
  • Improvements to dotnet tool search help text #27831

Closed

  • [API Compat] Add rule to prohibit making a member virtual #18683
    Backlog
  • dotnet tools use wrong architecture of libhostfxr.dylib on Mac M1 #27761
  • Baseline package validator doesn't report renamed arguments #26797
  • Update test once runtime AOT target changes are in the SDK repo #27533

PullRequests

Created

  • Improvements to dotnet tool search help text #27832
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't hardcode S.C.Immutable version #27830
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add linker notification to fabricbot #27825
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trusted roots: August 2022 CTL #27824
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [APICompat] Don't filter package assets and handle placeholder files #27822
    Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Produce a warning and ignore Prefer32Bit for netcoreapp #27796
  • [release/7.01xx] Remove erroneously added condition #27827
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Publish assets immediately #27828
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add output DebugSymbolsFiles to ResolvePackageAssets #27580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Porting back APICompat changes from main #27817
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [release/7.0.1xx] In build sign enable #27794
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Eliminate duplicate inputs to ComputeBlazorBuildAssets #27561
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix test to match runtime changes #27739
    Area-NativeAOT
  • Implements standard dotnet options for controlling output in dotnet new #27628
    area: dotnet new

Updated

  • Merge resolver retargeting to rc2 #27777
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1990863 #27789
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1990832 #27667
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move forward to 2.20.0 which is the latest release #27770
    Area-Infrastructure
  • changed list command example #27795
    area: dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27746
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove various timeouts #27699
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Separate return scopes #6450
  • Update diagnostics for scoped mismatches across overrides, implementations, and delegate conversions #6448

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Behavior of "var" quickinfo and nullable reference types #63959
  • AbstractEmbeddedLanguageBraceMatcher.FindBracesAsync should use frozen partial semantics #63958
  • Option to make using directive global. #63956
  • Global option to disable format on paste #63955
  • function and methods custom have different color. #63954
  • Navigate selected symbol's usage in current file using "Next"/"Previous" buttons (VisualAssistX feature) #63953
  • Format .editorConfig in Visual Studio #63952
  • IConversionOperation.IsChecked is not true from within checked statement #63951
  • Code cleanup unable to add lines in between elements when required by style (SA1516) #63950
  • Implement interface abstractly creates concrete explicit members when existing member names conflict with interface member names #63947
  • Name suggestion doesn't work with some generic types #63943
  • Add supporting for enumerating Embedded Resources for source generators #63941
  • Exceptions from diagnostic suppressors are not being reported in the IDE as AD0001 diagnostics #63939
    Backlog
  • Remove or document "CompilerDiagnostic" type #63938
    Backlog
  • [release/7.0] Unhandled exception. System.NotImplementedException: The method or operation is not implemented. #63940
  • Improve `ru` localization for code cleanup options #63935
  • Selection overflows to next line during rename #63933

Closed

  • `CSharpExtractClassCodeRefactoringProvider` throws exception when type members are contained directly in namespace #63315
    17.4
  • `OrganizeImportsTests` involving non-English characters are failing locally. #58834
    17.3
  • CSharpSyntaxTreeFactoryServiceFactory+CSharpSyntaxTreeFactoryService+RecoverableSyntaxTree.WithRootAndOptions does not preserve the Encoding property #63834
    17.4
  • Remove or reduce use of `ParameterSymbol.DeclaredScope` #63078
    Compiler.Next
  • Implicitly typed lambdas with `[UnscopedRef]` don't match their own anonymous delegate types #63565
    17.4
  • Stack overflow in roslyn while compiling `System.Private.CoreLib` in `dotnet/runtime` #63689
    17.4
  • Give a more specific diagnostic when file type collides with non-file type in same file #62333
    17.4
  • Change in text of CS7036 #63801
    Backlog
  • [In, Out] attributes removed from extern local function parameters #57325
    17.4
  • Assume Bug on macOS while building #63936

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure we use the type name in a default expression to prevent conflicts #63964
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify data model for task list #63963
    Area-IDE
  • Use ScopedTypeSyntax in LocalDeclarationStatementSyntax #63962
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix TestNavigateToDifferentProjects #63960
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Use real data type for diagnostic location information #63946
    Area-IDE
  • Delegate to base constructor when generating from members #63942
    Area-IDE
  • Fix Equals override for CompilerDiagnostic reported by CompilerDiagnosticAnalyzer #63937
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63957
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Change extension of metadata file produced by EnC logging from md to meta #63826
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Use attributes consistently in tests #63934
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Rename "Todo Comments" to "Task List" to match Editor naming here. #63949
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Create full insertions out of main-vs-deps #63961
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix extractclass when method has no type container #63913
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update vs-extension-testing to 0.1.145-beta #63903
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use frozen partial semantic for import completion in OOP #63862
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63932
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Test 'todo comments' with OOP #63944
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make compiler type message-pack serializable #63945
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Some improvements to Workspace.CanApplyChanges #63701
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixes implementation of With methods of recoverable trees #63876
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix completion service for providers with text view roles #63685
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Get pipelineid from env vars #63785
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add support for delete parameter intent #63546
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Propagate EffectiveScope to parameters of anonymous delegate types. #63787
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Guard against a regular stack overflow exception in ControlFlowGraphBuilder. #63854
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, Next
  • Give a specific error when a file type is duplicated in the same file #63829
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use the term 'parameter' instead of 'formal parameter' #63825
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Propagate In/Out attributes on local functions #63824
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cover the 'end' cases in AutomaticLineEnderTests #51703
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve readability of EnC log in memory dumps #63908
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Use attributes consistently in tests. #63930
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move diagnostic tagging to 'pull diagnostics' #63858
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clean up implementation of SymbolInfo #63698
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Unify handling of directive parsing accross multiple code paths #63832
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix issue caused by merges of two PRs that conflicted with each other. #63931
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Remove unused param #63966
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Replace Razor Source Generator reference with one loaded from a VSIX #63912
    Area-IDE
  • Add feature flag for convert to record #63910
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern (redux) #63902
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not serialize extern aliases to synthesized method #63928
    Area-Compilers
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63916
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Semantic snippets - prop snippet #63838
    Area-IDE
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Trace callstacks include native frames #465

  • [Feature Request] Allow tracing configuration to stop after long GC #464
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Ability to get context switch information in a trace #463
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-dump] Allow collect to start the proccess itself. #404
    8.0.0
  • dotnet.exe should not appear in "dotnet counters list-processes" #372
    8.0.0
  • Investigate: Use a file format for dotnet-trace profiles #337
    8.0.0
  • list-processes command shows processes from other users #314
    8.0.0
  • Misleading error message for dotnet-* tools when working cross container #1528
    8.0.0
  • Feature request: dotnet-symbol should acquire RedHat symbols #1506
    8.0.0
  • Feature request: Use dotnet-tools cross container without requiring a file-mount #1505
    8.0.0
  • Assume hex values (without the 0x prefix) on dotnet-dump command options #1460
    8.0.0
  • Add EventSource instrumentation to all .NET IO #1409
    8.0.0
  • SOS Plugin for Visual Studio #1397
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-dump: Add dump location path to DAC/DBI and assembly module search #1349
    8.0.0
  • Add Ubuntu 20.04 to the diagnostics repo test matrix #1131
    8.0.0
  • Running dotnet-counters in the background #1098
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime EventPipeProvider giving lot of CounterProfile. Need only CPU and Working set #1067
    8.0.0
  • Investigate ways for dotnet-dump collect to take coredumps without SYS_PTRACE #896
    8.0.0
  • Add EventPipe at Startup tests #883
    8.0.0
  • Use diagnostics global tools functionality at runtime for problem reporting #844

  • [Feature Request] dotnet trace should trigger based on namespace and frequency #832

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why do we need to bootstrap a functional startup project to generate an idempotent migration script? #29063
  • EF wrongly adds items #29060
  • RelationalModel.Create EFCore 6 #29058
  • Distributed transactions failures when running EF Core tests on main #29054
  • UriToStringConverter: original string not preserved #29053

Closed

  • Add Migration is not working in Ubuntu 22.04 #29052
  • InMemory: Use deferredOwnedExpansionExpression #26618
  • Query: Support GroupBy when it is final operator #19929
    7.0.0
  • Fix issues with annotations when setting different SqlServerValueGenerationStrategy #28560
    7.0.0
  • Update-Database -context [contextname] not working with User Secrets #28837
  • `EnableNullChecks` is cached unexpectedly? #26840
    7.0.0
  • How to correctly configure a composite primary key with HasDefault() for Sqlite? #27299
    7.0.0
  • Cannot create a unique index / alternate key - and wrong error message is given #28695
  • How can I get a deleted owned entity from the parent entity? #27848
  • [Always Encrypted] EF Core 6.0 Operand type clash : decimal(29, 27) is incompatible with money encrypted #27831
    7.0.0-rc2
  • [Bug]: Attach with `ValueGenerator` composite key not working in case of Relations (FK) #26448
    7.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert to provider values when comparing shared columns #29064
  • Query: Full support for entity splitting #29062
  • Make original value parameter check for sproc into a warning #29061

Merged

  • Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.1 #28986
  • Query : Add support for final GroupBy operator #28972
  • Fix logic for resetting facets in HasValueGenerationStrategy #29059
  • Use different internal service provider when EnableNullChecks is changed #29057
  • Allow database default values for FK properties that are part of a composite key #29047
  • Testing for query strings and various type mapping fixes #29051
  • Generated stable values to not imply that an entity is Added #29044

Updated

  • Query: Convert unflattened GroupJoin to correlated subquery #28998
  • Query: Support for GroupBy entity type #29019
